descriptions:
["DescriptionSitting on a corner plot of 15,000 sqft, this beautiful single row villa has an extended BUA of 8,400 sqft which is more than the usual units. This home offers magnificent proportions for those seeking spacious modern family living in the Arabian Ranches. It is furnished with Roche Bobois furniture.
The current owner has undertaken numerous alterations on this property working with an interior designer to modernize and upgrade it to reflect today's living requirements. This is truly a unique property in Mirador La Coleccion, exclusive with LUXHABITAT.
Entering the property the true size of this property can be appreciated with the grand atrium reception area which leads into the living room. Leading off this is a formal dining area and opposite to this is a formal lounge. The kitchen has been upgraded with sleek modern German cabinetry and a wonderful center island, perfect for cooking and entertaining with a secondary back kitchen to the rear of the property. Leading off the kitchen, is a breakfast room which has lots of light entering it allowing you to enjoy your breakfast in the morning sun. The ground floor also has a huge bathroom and adjacent powder room which can easily be converted to a guest suite. 
Upstairs, there is a large landing area with a terrace which leads off to the five big sized bedrooms. The master suite has its own balcony, walk in closet bath and shower.  The second bedroom also has a balcony and it's own en suite bathroom. The two further bedrooms are linked together with bathroom.
The property benefits from upgraded flooring throughout along with white woodwork which has all been powder coated to a high standard. 
Externally, there is a huge driveway with a double garage and attractive mature landscaping all around the property. The rear garden has a good sized pool along with outside shower and bathroom facilities. There is..."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxhabitat is pleased to present this great deal for a fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment for sale in Address Blvd.
The apartment stands at 1823 square feet and is located on mid floors with captivating full Burj and fountain views. 
The home is fully furnished and serviced, engulfed with superior quality luxury fittings and top of the line modern appliances, as well as designer amenities. 
The entrance leads into a large open plan living and dining area which has an amazing view of DIFC and the sea. The fully fitted kitchen offers state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances. The two bedrooms are very spacious and offer en-suite bathrooms and built-in wardrobes.
The apartment has two balconies with Burj Khalifa view, one from the living room and the second one from the master bedroom.
A city lifestyle resort set in the prestigious Downtown Dubai area, just a pleasant amble away from the cultural Opera District and The Dubai Mall, Address Boulevard offers world-class views of the magnificent Burj Khalifa. Inspired by European finesse while demonstrating old world, with notion of timeless elegance with its art deco architecture and craftsmanship.']

location1: ['Canal Cove Frond GDubai, Palm Jumeirah, Canal Cove Villas']
descriptions:
['DescriptionKnight Frank is pleased to present to the market this 4 Bedroom upgraded Canal Cove located between fronds F and G on the Palm Jumeirah. Offering a plot size of 5,059 sq. ft. with an internal living space of 4,100 sq. ft. this home perfectly combines luxury indoor and outdoor living.  
Property Features
•	4 En-suite Bedrooms
•	Independent Townhouse
•	Tastefully Upgraded
•	4,100 BUA
•	5,059 Plot
•	Vacant On Transfer
This well cared for fully upgraded townhouse is arranged over two floors and offers four en-suite bedrooms. The ground floor offers a brand new modern upgraded kitchen with a breakfast bar, a large open plan living dining area, a separate sitting room, all facing the mature gardens and large pool. An en-suite guest bedroom and guest powder room complete this floor. 
The owners have changed all the interior doors changed to a more neutral colour to flow with the summer house feel 
Rising to the first floor you find three more en-suite bedrooms. The master suite has its own sitting room and access to a large terrace; its balcony has beautiful views over the gardens, pool and sea.
The large swimming pool, communal gardens and direct beach access offer a relaxed lifestyle.
There is also private garage for 2 cars and 2 additional cars in the drive.']

['DescriptionParkway Vistas Villas by Emaar Properties
Parkway Vistas by Emaar Properties is a luxurious residential project situated in the prime location of Dubai Hills Estate. The extravagant villas of Parkway Vistas face part of the 18-hole golf course, and offer the perfect surroundings for family life with a network of green corridors connecting the districts and providing shaded pathways, cycling and jogging tracks. The residences are available in 6 and 7-bedroom luxury villas.
The Parkway Vistas project provides the opportunity to pay the property with 2 YEARS POST HANDOVER PAYMENT PLAN. With this exclusive payment scheme offer, anyone can now easily purchase the property within a flexible schedule with easy installments.
Parkway Vistas Villas feature cutting-edge architecture and modern design combined with the residences’ expansive indoor and outdoor living spaces, make the home a haven to relax and with large balconies overlooking private gardens and pools. Natural sunlight floods through floor-to-ceiling windows into its rooms that feature every modern convenience and amenities. Superior materials and finishes have been used to ensure lasting quality throughout the expansive villas.']
